Intervention: Zoledronic acid (ZA): 4 mg IV over 15 minutes administered once every 12 weeks for 4 cycles
Eligibility: Postmenopausal women, Stage III or axillary node positive
Currently disease free of breast cancer and other invasive malignancies at the time of registration
Results: Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) From Baseline to 1 Year

To determine whether zoledronate 4 mg IV every 12 weeks x 4 doses is associated with increases in bone mineral density at the lumbar spine and femoral head, calculated from baseline and 1 year data. Participants who missed one or more DXA were not evaluated.
Zoledronic acid (ZA): 4 mg IV over 15 minutes administered once every 12 weeks for 4 cycles
Unit of Measure: grams per cubic centimeter  Lumbar Spine L1-L4 (L1-L4): 0.048        (0.034 to 0.062)
Arm/Group Description: Observation only for 12 months
Unit of Measure: grams per cubic centimeter  Lumbar Spine L1-L4 (L1-L4): 0.007        (-0.020 to 0.034)
